ing: 6 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate (such as Minute MaidÂ®)
des: "My mum taught me how to make these and I have been hooked ever since."
ins: Pour beers into a large pitcher. Add limeade; stir to combine. Use limeade can to measure out tequila; pour into pitcher and stir to combine. Serve over ice.
